definition: variant of 為|为[wei4], because of/for/to
variant of 為|为[wei2]/as (i.e. in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do
as (in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do/by (in the passive voice)

sentences.english: It symbolizes good fortune, Gangnam civil called "the head of wealth."
sentences.chinese: 它象征着吉祥，江南民间称之为“富贵不断头”。

sentences.english: We may call this phenomenon catching the lion by its tail, and it is an unskillful thing to do.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以称之为抓住狮子的尾巴，这是不善巧的。

sentences.english: He called it a narrow escape. But it was really a cliff-hanger .
sentences.chinese: 他称之为侥幸逃脱，但那确实让他胆战心惊。

sentences.english: In genomic lingo, the sequences are said to "drift.
sentences.chinese: 用基因组术语，这个序列称之为“漂移”。

sentences.english: They call vividly this plate - type tool it the capture board .
sentences.chinese: 他们将这个板状工具形象地称之为“捕获板”。

sentences.english: What God looks on as obstinate weakness, we call strength.
sentences.chinese: 神看作顽梗的软弱，我们却称之为力量。

sentences.english: The independent instigator is namely what is regarded as "attempted instigation" acceptedly by ChineseForeign traditional theory of criminal law.
sentences.chinese: 对独立教唆犯，中外刑法理论上称之为“教唆未遂”。

sentences.english: Diameter with no scouring fabric woven silk fabric called hygiene.
sentences.chinese: 用未径练染丝线织成的织物称之为生织物。

sentences.english: They form a topology, and it is called fuzzy stratiform topology.
sentences.chinese: 层次闭集可以形成一种拓扑，称之为模糊层次拓扑。

sentences.english: Then between the east and the west, we have what we call the City,
sentences.chinese: 然后在东西部之间是中部，我们称之为城市。

sentences.english: It's P-functioning,as we've put it at one time or another.
This is what I call “Realistic idealism”.
sentences.chinese: 我称之为“现实的理想主义”。

sentences.english: His speech is called "Hip-Hop Saved My Life."
sentences.chinese: 他的演讲被人称之为“希普霍普拯救我的生命”。

sentences.english: The forces due to friction are called frictional forces.
sentences.chinese: 由于摩擦而产生的力称之为摩擦力。

sentences.english: We might call this the Milkman Indicator.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以将其称之为送奶工指标。

sentences.english: If a particular cargo is partially damaged, the damage is titled particular average.
sentences.chinese: 假如某批货是部份受损，咱们称之为“单独海损”。
